Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2017 07:11PM PatgMc wrote: After widespread bone mets diagnosis in September, I worried that starting a walking program might find me out on the sidewalk with snapped femurs! I asked to see an orthopedic oncologist who x-rayed and told me my skeleton was not compromised right now and I could do anything I wanted. I got up to 4 miles 4 times a week and, unfortunately, stopped when the weather got cold. You all are inspiring me to get started again! It was so good for me physically and mentally.
Posts.Title: Stage V MBC Fitness zarovka FuzzySocks
